content.question: Based on the data in the graph, which of the following methods would be used to calculate the percent change of wind energy generated from 2010 to 2015 ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction 200 kilowatt hours minus 100 kilowatt hours over 2015 minus 2010, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>200</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2015</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2010</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 200 kilowatt hours minus 100 kilowatt hours over 100 kilowatt hours, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>200</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 2015 minus 2010 over 200 kilowatt hours minus 100 kilowatt hours, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2015</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2010</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>200</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the fraction 200 kilowatt hours over 2015, end fraction, minus the fraction 100 kilowatt hours over 2010, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>200</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2015</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2010</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction 200 kilowatt hours minus 100 kilowatt hours over 100 kilowatt hours, end fraction, times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>200</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>100</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>k</mtext><mtext>Wh</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Determine an approach or method aligned with the problem to be solved.
